page.title: 08Services in Norham
page.content: There is a Bank -3 half days a week and a County library van every 2 weeks. A Chimney sweep visits by request. Refuse is collected weekly. There is mains drainage, only for the main village- outlying properties have septic tanks. Electricity, telephones and water are available to all but there is no gas supplied to either the villages or outlying area. Our General Practioner- Dr.G.Binnie holds surgeries 6 mornings, 4 evenings a week. There are 2 Builders; a Painter /Decorator;2 joiners; a Joiner /Undertaker who also makes fishing cobles; a Plumber; a Coal merchant; Garage for repairs but no petrol.There are also Agricultural and Road Haulage Contractors and an Agricultural engineering firm. There are 2 full, 3 part time river salmon fisheries .
